page.title: 15HOW I SPEND MY LEISURE TIME
page.content: In the summer months I go riding with my friend. We go to riding school for a lesson once a week. I also enjoy roller skating with my friends. A lot of people in the village have horses and they go riding and hunting. Some people also go shooting or fishing. Sometimes they use ferrets to hunt rabbits. I like going for walks across the fields. We often see rabbits and pheasants, lots of other animals, birds and wild flowers. We go looking for dens to use in the summer. Last summer we had a den which was big enough for about eight people. We spent most of the summer holidays playing there. I also made a den inside our shed with deckchairs and a table. We had picnics there.
